heading: Today
text: Periods of clouds and sun. A few snow showers in southwest VT.
temperature: Upper single numbers and teens north, teens to low 20s south

heading: Friday Night
text: Periods of clouds. A few snow showers southwest.
temperature: Close to zero north, and 10 above south

heading: Satuday
temperature: Low to mid teens north, upper teens to mid 20s south

heading: Sunday
text: Early clouds and snow showers. Increasing afternoon sun.
